source.name: USGS Volcanic Activity Alert-Notification System Description
source.description: Website provides plain-English description of the alert notification system that the USGS has adopted nationwide for characterizing the level of unrest and eruptive activity at the volacnoes and explanation of the alert levels and aviation color codes.

datasets.name: USGS Volcanic Activity Alert-Notification System Description
